title: BREAKING: Hurricane Harvey On Collision Course With Texas

json.text:
HURRICANE HARVEY IS ON THE
WAY. FOR NOW WE BELIEVE IT WILL

BE A CATEGORY 3 HURRICANE, COULD
BE WINDS OVER 100 MILES PER HOUR

AND HEAVY RAINS, IT'S LIKELY TO
HIT TEXAS. LET ME SHOW YOU SOME

PICTURES OF THE HURRICANE, OR AT
LEAST SATELLITE PICTURES, THAT

IS A GATHERING STORM, IF YOU
WILL, THAT'S THE PATH IT'S

LIKELY TO TAKE, ONE MORE PICTURE
HERE, THE LEVEL OF PRECIPITATION

AND THE STRENGTH OF THE STORM,
WE DON'T HAVE DOPPLER 4000 HERE,

NOR AM I A WEATHERMAN, WE COULD
HAVE BROUGHT IN MARK THOMPSON,

BUT THAT'S NOT THE POINT OF MY
STORY. THE POINT IS WHETHER THIS

IS GOD DOING IT. NOW, THAT
SOUNDS OUTRAGEOUS, RIGHT? BUT I

HEAR FROM CONSERVATIVES ALL THE
TIME WHENEVER THERE IS FLOODING

OR A HURRICANE, WHO DO THEY
BLAME? TO THEY BLAME

METEOROLOGISTS? NO, AND THAT
WOULDN'T BE FAIR EITHER. DO THEY

BLAME CLIMATE CHANGE? OH NO THEY
DON'T. THEY USUALLY BLAME PEOPLE

LIKE GAYS, LESBIANS, LIBERALS,
AND THEY DO IT IN ONE NATURAL

DISASTER AFTER ANOTHER.
SOMETIMES, AND ESPECIALLY IF IT

HITS AREAS WHERE THEY THINK
THERE'S A HIGHER PERCENTAGE OF

LIBERALS OR GAYS, FOR EXAMPLE
WHEN THE HURRICANE HIT NEW

ORLEANS, THERE WERE VERY
PROMINENT RIGHT-WING PASTORS IN

THE COUNTRY WHO SAID IT WAS
BECAUSE OF THE GAYS IN NEW

ORLEANS. IT WASN'T BECAUSE OF
THE OVERWHELMINGLY CONSERVATIVE

VOTERS OF LOUISIANA, NO,
DEFINITELY NOT. SO I WAS CURIOUS

TO SEE, THERE'S A HURRICANE
COMING THIS SEASON, WHERE IT

WILL HIT, AND WHY GOD IS UPSET.
IS IT GOING TO HIT GAY PEOPLE

AGAIN? AND HENCE THE IDEA THAT
IT IS DIRECTED TOWARDS THEM

BECAUSE GOD IS ANGRY AT US?
LET'S FIND OUT --
IT'S GETTING STRONGER --

IT'S COMING, GUYS. THE STORM
IS COMING, IT'S GETTING STRONGER

AND STRONGER. NOW, THERE'S A
THEORY OUT THERE THAT AS THE

PLANET WARMS UP THE OCEAN ALSO
WARMS UP AND ACTUALLY

INTENSIFIES THE STORMS, HENCE
MAYBE GOING FROM A TROPICAL

STORM TO A CATEGORY 3 HURRICANE
IS EXACTLY WHAT WOULD HAPPEN

DURING CLIMATE CHANGE. YOU CAN'T
SAY THAT ANYONE STORMS BECAUSE

OF CLIMATE CHANGE, BUT AGAIN
LET'S FOCUS ON WHY GOD MIGHT BE

ANGRY HERE, BECAUSE I'M SURE
THAT'S THE REASON, NOT HAVING

ANYTHING TO DO WITH CLIMATE
CHANGE --
WAIT A MINUTE --

HUH. HOW IS THAT FOR TWIST?
DIDN'T SEE THAT COMING. MAYBE

GOD IS ANGRY AT THE OIL
COMPANIES. WHAT DO THEY DO? OH

RIGHT, CREATE CLIMATE CHANGE.
CERTAINLY HELPED TO CREATE IT.

IS IT JUST A COUPLE OF
COMPANIES? THAT'S CHERRY PICKING

LIKE THE REVERENDS DO ABOUT LGBT
PEOPLE WHEN STORMS COME. LET'S
FIND OUT --

THAT'S A GIGANTIC PERCENTAGE
OF THE REFINERIES AND JUST A

SMALL LITTLE AREA, JUST THE AREA
WHERE THE HURRICANE IS GOING TO

HIT. IS IT COINCIDENCE? OR
PERHAPS JUSTICE?

SO THERE'S THE OIL FIELDS
GETTING HIT, THE REFINERIES

GETTING HIT, THE CRUDE OIL
GETTING HIT -- YOU START CLIMATE

CHANGE AND ALL OF A SUDDEN YOU
GET THE CONSEQUENCES OF CLIMATE

CHANGE. WHEN IT HITS EVERYONE
ELSE, NO BIG DEAL, IT WAS THE

GAYS WHO DID IT. WHEN IT HITS
YOU, ALL OF A SUDDEN YOU ARE

CONCERNED. YOU ARE WORRIED ABOUT
YOUR BOTTOM LINE, GAS PRICES

GOING UP, ETC. WHAT ABOUT THE
WHOLE WORLD'S BOTTOM LINE? LOOK,

DO I WANT THE PEOPLE OF TEXAS
GETTING HURT? ABSOLUTELY NOT, I

DON'T WANT ANYONE GETTING HURT,
I DON'T CARE WHO THEY VOTED FOR

OR WHAT THEY DO OR WHAT THEIR
JOBS ARE OR ANYTHING ALONG THOSE

LINES, BECAUSE WE AREN'T
ACTUALLY MONSTERS LIKE THE

RIGHT-WING ARE, LIKE THOSE
INSANE FUNDAMENTALIST PREACHERS

ARE. HAVING SAID THAT, MAN, IF
THESE WILL COMPANIES -- IT'S NOT

IF -- THEY ARE AN ENORMOUS PART
OF THE REASON WHY CLIMATE CHANGE

EXIST IN THE FIRST PLACE, I'M
NOT GOING TO SHED A TEAR ABOUT

THE FINANCIAL DAMAGE IT DOES TO
THOSE COMPANIES AS THEY HAVE

INFLICTED ENORMOUS FINANCIAL AND
HUMAN DAMAGE, OFTEN COSTING

INCREDIBLE AMOUNTS OF LIVES ALL
OVER THE WORLD, WITH CLIMATE

CHANGE. THEY PRIVATIZE THE GAINS
BUT THEY SOCIALIZE THE LOSSES ON

ALL OF US WITH THE CONSEQUENCES
OF THEIR ACTIONS, WHICH IS THE

WARMING OF THE PLANET. SO THOSE
CHICKENS ARE COMING HOME TO

ROOST IN TEXAS OVER THE WEEKEND.
I HOPE EVERY HUMAN BEING IS

SAFE, AND BY HUMAN BEINGS I DO
NOT INCLUDE MULTINATIONAL

CORPORATIONS, ESPECIALLY THE
ONES THAT STARTED CLIMATE CHANGE
IN THE FIRST PLACE.
